name: A New Surface
description:
Humanity has finally reached a new planet with life living on it, it is up to 1 astronaut, Ray, to go around and find and scan crystals with glyphs on them to help humanity uncover what they mean and potentially lead to being able to communicate with the life on the planet.

Ray can only be on the planet for 90 seconds at a time before he has to return to his ship, so it is a risk reward scenario. The more curious you are, the more crystals you will find and the more you will help humanity.

The controls for movement are Forward, Back, Left and Right, which are controlled by WASD.

To look around, move the mouse around. A crosshair is on screen to show you what you're currently looking at.

To use your scanner, double click and then hold Left Mouse Button.

Github - https://github.com/EuanG939/ANewSurfaceRepo
